cards.pin: used for the Node JavaScript platform. It puts modules in place so that node can find them, and manages dependency conflicts intelligently. It is extremely configurable to support a wide variety of use cases. Most commonly, it is used to publish, discover, install, and develop node programs... like this one!
it includes all you need to execute a program written in JS... like this one!

cards.han: NPM package that allows us to run code like node
cards.pin: will restart the app when the directory changes
